document_data.name: Showaxe
document_data.mainbody: '''King Showaxe''' was the ruler of the [[dwarves]] who inhabited the [[Mountains of the Alaoreum]] ''circa'' [[227 DR]].
document_data.History: King Showaxe of [[Ironfang Deep|Ironfang]] led his troops into an epic battle with a fearsome [[red dragon]] named [[Stormcrossing]] in the {{YearlinkName|227}}. King Showaxe emerged victorious in the clash and claimed the dragon's hoard. But the price of victory was steep—Stormcrossing set the dwarven town of [[Deepgate‎]] ablaze. A column of smoke from the pyre alerted [[human]]s from the [[Swordslake Creek]] of the previously unknown dwarven presence in the Alaoreum.
